website_summaries.verdict: The most comfortable, lightweight cleats on the market, these shoes provide long-lasting support to keep you going through every inning.
pros: Features a bootie design that offers a fit that’s as close to custom as you can get
Foam midsole provides plush cushioning that keeps feet comfortable and energized
Breathe well thanks to the synthetic/mesh upper
Collar is padded to protect the ankle
Molded cleats are made of TPU for comfort and durability
cons: Some buyers find the cleats don’t last as long as they’d like

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My son liked the look of these shoes, but very disappointed in quality. He has been practicing for a month now and both shoes are cracked on bottom already. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: traci b

customer_reviews.title: Wide shoes baseball shoes for a tall 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are a true wide width. Very hard to find and went to the brick and mortar looking at shoes 2 to 3 times larger in size to accommodate my son’s wide feet. He says they are comfortable and they have the molded cleats for Little League Baseball. So glad to have Amazon in our lives!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Huh?

customer_reviews.title: Great cleat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleat! I have plantar fasciitis and put my superfeet insert into these and wore them right away. No knee pain, no foot pain- I convinced a bunch of others to buy them and they love them. I highly recommend them. Thank you for having wide cleats- I ordered men's sizes 2E- I bought 2 different sizes, picked one and gave the other to my niece who loves them. Three of my teammates have since purchased them and love them too.
customer_reviews.author: myinak

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair
customer_reviews.text: These were for my 12 yr old son who is going to play Little League and travel ball this summer....roughly 60 games. He has a black pair that fit perfect so we got a second pair to try to save his feet this summer when it gets hot. He loves them. Rarely are there no complaints from kids but he never said a word right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Naughton

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: While these shoes were a great fit and my daughter stopped complaining about her feet hurting, they only lasted 2 months. Bottoms cracked/split on both feet under toe. Right shoe also started separating. Daughter is 12 (average size) and is a pitcher, so I expected the toe area to give out eventually. But for the price I feel these should have lasted longer than 2 months. I wasn't expecting the bottoms to split. We have had many pairs of cleats and I have never seen any split like that.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy cleats
customer_reviews.text: These cleats are outstanding! I have wide feet and these cleats fit me even better than my previous NB cleats, which always felt snug although they were a wide width. Buy these cleats, they are super comfortable on the field!
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but good support
customer_reviews.text: Bought from Warehouse Deals at minimal cost. Shoes are lightweight, but provide excellent lateral and arch support. Very surprising. They also breathe very well. I have played about 40 games now with these shoes and they show little wear. I have already bought another pair as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Best cleat for wide feet that we have found, and have tried many.
customer_reviews.text: My son has wide and flat feet. All of the other cleats we have tried he was uncomfortable in, and also kept him from performing @ his best. These cleats have been like a gift for him. Prior to finding them, he was very uncomfortable, and it showed. Highly recommend for wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: A.Corley

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit large, but ultra comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable pair of cleats I've ever owned. I opted for the wide fit ones and they are probably a bit too big from what I normally wear but still really comfortable and roomy. Has a neat little spot to tuck the laces into the tongue so they aren't flopping around everywhere too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son and he said they felt good on his feet. He also likes the style of the cleat. The shoes also came in just in time as they were scheduled to arrive later so he was able to wear them for his first game of the season!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Running on a Memory Foam Mattress
customer_reviews.text: These cleats are terrific they fit exactly as I hoped and the cushioning is that of nothing I have ever experienced before. It seriously feels like I am running on a memory foam mattress. I know it sound hybolistic but it is the only way I can describe it. Thank you for the solid packaging, and the quick shipment.
customer_reviews.author: john smithson

customer_reviews.title: 14 Wide
customer_reviews.text: 14 Wide. I have wide feet. Running shoes I buy 14. 4E from the company that starts with an A. These cleats have a wide toe box. The toe box is wider than the previous version 3000v3. Great fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: John from Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of cleats.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the NB Cypher 12 Cleat - Men's Baseball XS 9" cleats and had to return them because they felt very loose from the heel even after tightening the laces. I was a bit hesitant to purchase the NB 3000v4 after my mentioned experience with the Cypher 12 . I went ahead and ordered these cleats and after a full season of slowpitch games, I can honestly say these are great cleats that feel very light, comfortable, and not loose around the heels. The fit was true to size and I have not seen significant wear on the cleats
customer_reviews.author: Felipe S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light shoes, and they look great. My only complaint is the cleats do NOT last long. They wear out very quickly. They are made out of a hard plastic vs a more rubber type like on my Under Armor spikes...
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleats
customer_reviews.text: Returned as was too large but I was also trying to buy a men's shoe for a 9 year old. Size chart should be the same but I would size down if buying for a child. Otherwise nice cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great cleat
customer_reviews.text: My son’s foot grew. New balance is the only cleat made for feet that aren’t narrow. Fitting true to regular shoe size. There is a wider size open. Love new balance.
customer_reviews.author: Shasta Fancher

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Seems vegan separating within 10 days of wear. $30 more than being sold at Dicks Sporting Goods. Should have checked there first so I could do an easy return.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Poor

customer_reviews.title: Seem like high quality shoe, order 1 to 1.5 sizes bigger than you normally wear
customer_reviews.text: These seem like high quality cleats, but the size is way too small. I normally wear a 13 but bought these in a 14 hoping they would be big enough. However, my toes are still up against the end.
customer_reviews.author: Jackalope

customer_reviews.title: Great solid shoe for large boys
customer_reviews.text: My son is big for his age and plays catcher. He wears men's size 10 and he's only 12. This shoe gave him great grip and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Used for spring season of 12u ball. Had two cleats break off and the bottom of the shoe cracked. Others on the team had similar issues. The two stars were for comfort. Btw this was a 65lb 12yo.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Lackey

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and function with clear traction
customer_reviews.text: Great wearing cleat. Not as wide as I would like, so I used a shoe stretcher to help in that dept.
customer_reviews.author: eastendjim

customer_reviews.title: look better in person
customer_reviews.text: these look awesome wish they had these in regular tennis shoes
customer_reviews.author: J brock

customer_reviews.title: Best for wide feet on the market.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I have wide feet and new balance doesn’t disappoint. Highly recommend if you’re like me and tried every cleat in dicks sporting goods and have wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cost

customer_reviews.title: Great show for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and he likes them. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey deal

customer_reviews.title: Great cleat
customer_reviews.text: Love these cleats. My second pair like this. Super comfortable, great grip, look good, and hold up well. What more can you want?
customer_reviews.author: Chet S

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleats
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly - same price as at Dick's or New Balance online. Nice cleats, my son is happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Christine Healy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these cleats. They are very comfortable. They fit perfect. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: GMC

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fits exactly as expected. Great quality and no different than buying in store. Really happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mittone

customer_reviews.title: Picture doesn’t do this shoe justice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe. Very excited to Wear these next year. Inside ankle liner grips my foot in a comfortable way and the padding in the sole is incredible. Best cleat I’ve ever worn. Makes all the Nike and under armour cleats feel cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: kyale stephens

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable for a softball shoe. Totally worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Antranik Baharian

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 9 year old son he has big wide feet. He said they are comfortable and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: sbond

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats
customer_reviews.text: Super good cleats and fit perfectly as expected I would recommend this to anyone as new balance is a very good brand and cleats are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: jason lopez

customer_reviews.title: FInally!! XW Shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: My son has XW feet and it's difficult to find stylish, affordable, XW shoes. He loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: Eros Dialogos

customer_reviews.title: Both soles CRACKED in half!
customer_reviews.text: Had them for about one month and BOTH soles cracked in half! The plastic is too brittle and both shoes cracked at the ball of the foot. These are totally defective but now cant return them. I was a loyal user of NB but no longer.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Avoid purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting shoe but after 2 tournaments less than one month of use the rubber cleats fell off. Horrible quality to do that after literally less than 14 hours of play time for a 12 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe's
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfect to correct size, great look, love NB for all our baseball show needs.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. My son catches and they have held up well
customer_reviews.author: Lysa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The cleats arrived fast fit great the fabric outer is great doesn’t pinch feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Minimal support
customer_reviews.text: Very little support. Nice looking cleat but it runs small and is very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: john signorelli

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son who plays travel ball. I was nervous since he couldn’t try them on but he’s had new balance before, so decided to try them. He loved them and they worked great for the season!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Vanek

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to find wide baseball shoes. These were perfect. I use them for senior softball.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A. Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $80 as they only last two months.
customer_reviews.text: Fit exactly as they should and were comfortable. However after 2 months of use the bottoms have completely cracked across. Seems to be a flaw in the shoe that always happens. Figured of an $80 of cleats would last longer. I’ve gotten longer use out of $30 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son and he said they are super comfortable and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Loves these cleats.
customer_reviews.text: My 12yo absolutely loves these. NB has the best baseball cleats available
customer_reviews.author: TodaysSpecial

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. Price was better than our local sports store
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Soles cracked after 2 months...
customer_reviews.text: Soles cracked after 2 months and had to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Caccavo

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 pairs for my twins. They started wearing them in April and we are now in the beginning of July and both pairs have cracked in the exact same spot on the soles. I would have expected at least a full season out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but should order it half size up for better comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but Order it a half size bigger and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go a size up if you have a wide foot
customer_reviews.text: It’s wide enough for wide feet and it’s comfortable. I usually wear a size 13 in shoes but decided that at size 14 was a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: They are plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t notice that they are plastic cleats. But will use them anyway. They look great, just wish they were metal cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Butherus

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect right out of the box and to the field, no break in needed...
customer_reviews.author: peter birli

customer_reviews.title: Baseball cleat
customer_reviews.text: My son is 13 and these are great fit true to size
customer_reviews.author: Amy C  Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Cracking on the sole
customer_reviews.text: Clear cracked across the ball of the big toe area on the bottom. He only wears them when he pitches on turf mounds so maybe 35 innings
customer_reviews.author: tammy shiffler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Fits is perfect! My 9 year old says they are the most comfortable shoes he has worn!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Elkin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son has flat feet & has custom orthotics. They fit perfectly in these cleats (wide) which is a game changer!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Muller

customer_reviews.title: New Balance is great quality.
customer_reviews.text: New Balance baseball shoes are the best. It is all we buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit and color matching
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed these shoes for his softball team. Received shoes on time he stated the shoes are very comfortable so we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mz June

customer_reviews.title: Run half size small
customer_reviews.text: Run a half size to small and cleats wear out too fast!! Insole could be a little more comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Joeytracks29

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleats
customer_reviews.text: 11 yr old son wears these for his competitive baseball team. They look sharp. He likes them!
customer_reviews.author: Amy K.

customer_reviews.title: Look great, feel great for about 30min....
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit to break in, not super comfortable during a long softball tourney. They look good tho!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Backe

customer_reviews.title: Fit my wide footed child great
customer_reviews.text: They allowed the insoles to easily come out to put an orthopedic insole in.
customer_reviews.author: juliansjungle

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Cleats are snug, but do not hurt feet. I recommend these cleats to all!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Rice

customer_reviews.title: These shoes lasted for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: They are already missing cleat pegs and the sole ripped in half! Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought May 19th. Sole already cracked 2 months later.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, but this seems to happen to NB.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Good cleats
customer_reviews.text: Baseball cleats, fit well. Seem to be durable for travel ball.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Cleats for 2019 baseball season
customer_reviews.text: My boy really likes these so far. Fits true to size and good for turf or grass
customer_reviews.author: Boles

customer_reviews.title: Cracked shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bottom of the cleat cracked in half 5 within months
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Mendoza

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 3000 V4 TPU Molded Baseball Shoe
product_meta.description:
The 3000v4 takes comfort in baseball to a revolutionary new level.

New Balance, is dedicated to helping athletes achieve their goals. It's been their mission for more than a century. It's why they don't spend money on celebrity endorsements. They spend it on research and development. It's why they don't design products to fit an image. They design them to fit. New Balance is driven to make the finest shoes for the same reason athletes lace them up: to achieve the very best.
feature_bullets: Fresh Foam midsole cushioning technology for superior comfort and support
